titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1652) to provide extended unemployment benefits to displaced workers, and to make other improvements in the unemployment insurance system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Hooley (OR). Petition No: 108-4.

bill.summary: 10/15/2003--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1652 (Unemployment Benefits Extension Act).
